title: Couple With Heart Man Light Skin Tone Woman Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents a couple in love, specifically a lighter-skinned man and a darker-skinned woman, with a heart between them symbolizing their deep affection and romantic connection. Used to express love, partnership, and romantic relationships.
